description.value:
Your powers of conjuration grow, and your Ethereal Chain becomes a tool to smite your enemies with a deadly sharpness that could cleave through them. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.archetypes.Item.1042nX37l0OjvEd2]{Smiting Chain} focus spell.

            Your Ethereal Chain also becomes more powerful. It gains the fatal d8 trait. When you conjure it, if you are holding a weapon in the Flail category, the Ethereal Chain can copy its material and any potency, striking or property runes it possesses. It can support up to twice your carried bulk when used as a rope, and you can also use it to pull or grab unattended objects of 2 bulk or lower or use it to Grab a Ledge.

@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.archetypes.Item.QSu9hZ87DVEthnvM]{Greater Ethereal Chain}
